text: Yvette Chauviré (22 April 1917 - 19 October 2016) was a French prima ballerina and actress. She was born in Paris. Her dancing career was from 1937 to 1972.NYTimes retrieved 8th June 2010 She was the étoile of the Paris Opera Ballet, and later its director. She was the holder of the Légion d'Honneur. She died at her home in Paris on 19 October 2016, aged 99. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Paris Category:French ballet dancers
title: Yvette Chauviré
